title: Refund
body: How can i refund my money back?

replies.body:
If still have refund tokens available, you should be able to do those refunds through the Purchase History in your client. 

If you're trying to get your money back for those purchases, double check our [**content refund faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864) and then shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if needed!
My HoÂ¡istory finishes before I bought Sion. Can I max the history or I did it a lot of time ago?
